item.description:
Nothing tastes better on a crisp New Hampshire fall afternoon than delicious bowl of chowder. So please join us for the First Annual FSP Octoberfest Chowda Cookoff.

This will be a friendly competition and celebration of this native New England dish. The tasters need only to bring their appetites. Anyone wanting to join the competition is welcome to bring a crock of their favorite family recipe.

Drinks and non-chowder food stuffs will be provided as well.

The cookoff will take place at the home of Honey & Todd Puterbaugh:
68 Beauty Hill Rd.
Barrington, NH

Come and join us for a "wicked" good time, some "chowda", and FSP communion and brotherhood.

This event is part of a series weekend events that are the Free State Project Octoberfest. To learn more and see the schedule, search "Octoberfest, Free State Project" on Facebook, or try this URL http://www.facebook.c....

Thanks,
Todd Puterbaugh
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy cooking the best chowda there!
item.name: First Annual FSP Octoberfest Chowda Cookoff
